function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Functional inconsistencies and interferences within the same building","Impact":"Decreased quality of life, potential for increased stress and conflict","Mitigation":"Design and plan spaces to minimize conflicting use, establish clear boundaries for different activities","Technologies":"Building management systems, zoning and occupancy sensors","People":"Building occupants, residents","Owner":"Architects, building designers"},{"Description":"Simultaneous presence of units and spaces with incoherent functional use","Impact":"Noise and atmospheric pollution, decreased safety and privacy","Mitigation":"Evaluate and plan for the impact of different activities, prioritize complementary and compatible activities","Technologies":"Sound insulation materials, indoor air quality monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, residents","Owner":"Architects, building designers"},{"Description":"Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) concerns","Impact":"Health risks for occupants, decreased well-being","Mitigation":"Adopt sustainable architecture principles, implement IAQ monitoring and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, IAQ sensors, sustainable building materials","People":"Building occupants, residents","Owner":"Architects, building designers"}]}
